Services.Description: McAfee Agent service
McAfee Agent Common services
McAfee Agent Backwards Compatibility Service
Provides firewall services to McAfee products
Manages McAfee services
Provides validation trust protection services
This service starts and runs anti-virus software components, including the on-access scanner.
Where available it reports to the Windows Security Center (WSC) providing information about Sophos Anti-Virus. On computers without the WSC, the service runs but does nothing.

Monitors a distribution folder (share) and updates endpoint components (including malware IDEntity files) whenever there are newer versions available. Will also download when the local AutoUpdate cache is incomplete or when the catalog in the share has changed.
Cleans up malware detected by Intercept X (HMPA), Exploit Prevention, and PE files.
Performs device control functions such as detecting and blocking unauthorized USB devices attached to the computer.
Manages BitLocker disk encryption.
Prevents undesired actions to Sophos components which is explained further on KBA 123654.
Used to scans files for reputation, deep learning, and Application ID.
Used to manage and performs live query actions on the device.
Determines the health status of the endpoint.
Management Communications Agent
Management Communications Client

Intercepts outgoing network traffic and then makes use of Sophos System Protection to determine the reputation of the destination.Forwards the results to the HIPS system to determine any follow on actions.

Allows customers and Sophos to release items from the SafeStore which will move the items back to their original locations, basically reverting them to a state before removal. This is the primary remediation agent for Machine Learning and Exploit prevention detections.

Gathers and records information from other Sophos components on the system and can look up information from Sophos cloud services. The information gathered from multiple sources is used intelligently to improve the detection of malicious files, processes, and traffic.
Manages Web Control policies.
Protects against threats from malicious websites.
Ensures web usage is safe and consistent with policy. (Windows 8+/2012+ only).
Exploit mitigation and web browser intrusion detection, real-time, and behavior-based.
Threat hunting and monitoring for suspicious activity
Helps protect the system from malicious activities.
Provides malware and threat protection for Symantec Endpoint Protection
Checks that the computer complies with the defined security policy and communicates with the Symantec Enforcers to allow your computer to access the corporate network.
Embedded database used by Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager
Launch service which can invoke special processes for Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager.
Application server which communicates with Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager, Symantec Protection clients, and a database.

Services.SvcName: Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager API Service
Services.Description: Application server provides web services.

This service allows a MSS Collector to remotely access DB services. This is service is only installed when the Synapse Log Collector for SEPM Embedded DB is installed for ATP. The log collector enables ATP to collect incident logs from a Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager database.
Bridge service.

Services.SvcName: Symantec Endpoint Protection Bridge Uploader Service
Services.Description: Data uploader service.
